title: Osho_ Beyond Enlightenment_(32 files)(non-edited)
description:
Osho_ Beyond Enlightenment, 
Talks given from 03/10/86 pm to 04/11/86 pm
English Discourse series
32 Chapters

-new editions are edited as follows:

A standard music at the beginning and the end of the discourses added for the whole series, announcement without date and time.
"Bhagwan" and names of questioners removed. 
Questions shortened and changed and new recorded and added to the discourses.
.......................
Original discourses can be still downloaded free from oshoworld(dot)com

For free pdf original book, ask Google:

...............................
In this torrent there are original discourses, but 3 edited discourses are also added, because they were missing in oshoworld.com. (These are discourses nr. 13, 14, 19).
Corresponding original text of these discourses is in 3 attached files.

Here is example of editing Question 4 in discourse nr. 14

original Question 4

"BELOVED Bhagwan,
I SEEM TO BE SO UNCONSCIOUS SO MUCH OF THE TIME, SO VERY UNAWARE AND JUST SIMPLY INVOLVED IN LIFE AND LOVING LIVING IT.
WHEN YOU SPEAK ABOUT THE TOTALITY AND INTENSITY OF THE SEARCH, AND HOW NOTHING ELSE REALLY MATTERS, AND HOW IMPORTANT IT IS TO LET NOTHING BECOME A DISTRACTION, I FEAR I WILL NEVER MANAGE IT.
IN MY HEART I FEEL NOTHING ELSE DOES MATTER, YET I AM NOT LIVING IN THIS AWARENESS ALL THE TIME AND IN EVERY SITUATION.
WOULD IT BE GOOD FOR ME TO TRY TO BRING THIS AWARENESS TO EACH AND EVERY MOMENT, EVEN IF IT REQUIRES INTENSE EFFORT? IF YOU FEEL THIS IS GOOD FOR ME, I WILL TRY IT EVEN THOUGH I AM AFRAID I MAY LOSE SOME OF THE FUN AND SPONTANEITY AND EASE OF JUST LIVING, AND EVEN THOUGH I DON'T KNOW IF I CAN MANAGE IT."

A: Maitri, the question is significant for everybody. ....
.............

Edited Question 4

"Should I try to be aware all the time even if it means loosing some of the ease just living?"

A:(the name of the questioner is removed)..The question is signifficant for everybody. ...
.....................................................................................................

I feel this is unfair to Osho and to the people who want to get his message in original form as he was giving it in his discourses.It feels to me,like cheating.
We cannot trust anymore to osho.com. They are not spreading original Osho's work. They are mixing Osho's words creating more new books just to sell. 
Please share original whenever you can
